Title: Section 8

reviewText: I recently purchased this movie and was blown away by the performances done by all the actors/actresses.  It was funny, thought-provoking and real.  All that.  It had a wonderful theatrical appeal that makes the viewer feel as if they are part of a live stage production.  I loved it and would highly recommend it to anyone.  Bravo, to all those involved in making this entertaining piece.
Title: Section 8
